6// mtl_command_buffer.h:
7// Defines the wrapper classes for Metal's MTLCommandEncoder, MTLCommandQueue and
8// MTLCommandBuffer.
9//
10
11#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_COMMANDENBUFFERMTL_H_
12#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_COMMANDENBUFFERMTL_H_

30namespace rx

32namespace mtl

34
35enum CommandBufferFinishOperation
36{
37 NoWait,
38 WaitUntilScheduled,
39 WaitUntilFinished
40};
41
42class CommandBuffer;
43class CommandEncoder;
44class RenderCommandEncoder;
45class OcclusionQueryPool;
46
47class CommandQueue final : public WrappedObject<id<MTLCommandQueue>>, angle::NonCopyable
48{
49 public:
50 void reset();
51 void set(id<MTLCommandQueue> metalQueue);
52
53 void finishAllCommands();
54
55 // This method will ensure that every GPU command buffer using this resource will finish before
56 // returning. Note: this doesn't include the "in-progress" command buffer, i.e. the one hasn't
57 // been commmitted yet. It's the responsibility of caller to make sure that command buffer is
58 // commited/flushed first before calling this method.
59 void ensureResourceReadyForCPU(const ResourceRef &resource);
60 void ensureResourceReadyForCPU(Resource *resource);
61
62 // Check whether the resource is being used by any command buffer still running on GPU.
63 // This must be called before attempting to read the content of resource on CPU side.
64 bool isResourceBeingUsedByGPU(const ResourceRef &resource) const
65 {
66 return isResourceBeingUsedByGPU(resource.get());
67 }
68 bool isResourceBeingUsedByGPU(const Resource *resource) const;
69
70 // Checks whether the last command buffer that uses the given resource has been committed or not
71 bool resourceHasPendingWorks(const Resource *resource) const;
72
73 CommandQueue &operator=(id<MTLCommandQueue> metalQueue)
74 {
75 set(metalQueue);
76 return *this;
77 }
78
79 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLCommandBuffer>> makeMetalCommandBuffer(uint64_t *queueSerialOut);
80 void onCommandBufferCommitted(id<MTLCommandBuffer> buf, uint64_t serial);
81
82 private:
83 void onCommandBufferCompleted(id<MTLCommandBuffer> buf, uint64_t serial);
84 using ParentClass = WrappedObject<id<MTLCommandQueue>>;
85
86 struct CmdBufferQueueEntry
87 {
88 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLCommandBuffer>> buffer;
89 uint64_t serial;
90 };
91 std::deque<CmdBufferQueueEntry> mMetalCmdBuffers;
92 std::deque<CmdBufferQueueEntry> mMetalCmdBuffersTmp;
93
94 uint64_t mQueueSerialCounter = 1;
95 std::atomic<uint64_t> mCommittedBufferSerial{0};
96 std::atomic<uint64_t> mCompletedBufferSerial{0};
97
98 mutable std::mutex mLock;
99};
100
101
102class CommandBuffer final : public WrappedObject<id<MTLCommandBuffer>>, angle::NonCopyable
103{
104 public:
105 CommandBuffer(CommandQueue *cmdQueue);
106 ~CommandBuffer();
107
108 // This method must be called so that command encoder can be used.
109 void restart();
110
111 // Return true if command buffer can be encoded into. Return false if it has been committed
112 // and hasn't been restarted.
113 bool valid() const;
114 void commit(CommandBufferFinishOperation operation = NoWait);
115
116
117
118 void present(id<CAMetalDrawable> presentationDrawable);
119
120 void setWriteDependency(const ResourceRef &resource);
121 void setReadDependency(const ResourceRef &resource);
122 void setReadDependency(Resource *resourcePtr);
123
124 void queueEventSignal(const mtl::SharedEventRef &event, uint64_t value);
125 void serverWaitEvent(const mtl::SharedEventRef &event, uint64_t value);
126
127 void insertDebugSign(const std::string &marker);
128 void pushDebugGroup(const std::string &marker);
129 void popDebugGroup();
130
131 CommandQueue &cmdQueue() { return mCmdQueue; }
132
133 // Private use only
134 void setActiveCommandEncoder(CommandEncoder *encoder);
135 void invalidateActiveCommandEncoder(CommandEncoder *encoder);
136
137 private:
138 void set(id<MTLCommandBuffer> metalBuffer);
139 void cleanup();
140
141 bool validImpl() const;
142 void commitImpl();
143 void forceEndingCurrentEncoder();
144
145 void setPendingEvents();
146 void setEventImpl(const mtl::SharedEventRef &event, uint64_t value);
147 void waitEventImpl(const mtl::SharedEventRef &event, uint64_t value);
148
149 void pushDebugGroupImpl(const std::string &marker);
150 void popDebugGroupImpl();
151
152 using ParentClass = WrappedObject<id<MTLCommandBuffer>>;
153
154 CommandQueue &mCmdQueue;
155
156 CommandEncoder *mActiveCommandEncoder = nullptr;
157
158 uint64_t mQueueSerial = 0;
159
160 mutable std::mutex mLock;
161
162 std::vector<std::string> mPendingDebugSigns;
163 std::vector<std::pair<mtl::SharedEventRef, uint64_t>> mPendingSignalEvents;
164
165 std::vector<std::string> mDebugGroups;
166
167 bool mCommitted = false;
168};
169
170class CommandEncoder : public WrappedObject<id<MTLCommandEncoder>>, angle::NonCopyable
171{
172 public:
173 enum Type
174 {
175 RENDER,
176 BLIT,
177 COMPUTE,
178 };
179
180 virtual ~CommandEncoder();
181
182 virtual void endEncoding();
183
184 virtual void reset();
185 Type getType() const { return mType; }
186
187 CommandEncoder &markResourceBeingWrittenByGPU(const BufferRef &buffer);
188 CommandEncoder &markResourceBeingWrittenByGPU(const TextureRef &texture);
189
190 void insertDebugSign(NSString *label);
191
192 virtual void pushDebugGroup(NSString *label);
193 virtual void popDebugGroup();
194
195 protected:
196 using ParentClass = WrappedObject<id<MTLCommandEncoder>>;
197
198 CommandEncoder(CommandBuffer *cmdBuffer, Type type);
199
200 CommandBuffer &cmdBuffer() { return mCmdBuffer; }
201 CommandQueue &cmdQueue() { return mCmdBuffer.cmdQueue(); }
202
203 void set(id<MTLCommandEncoder> metalCmdEncoder);
204
205 virtual void insertDebugSignImpl(NSString *marker);
206
207 private:
208 const Type mType;
209 CommandBuffer &mCmdBuffer;
210};
211
212// Stream to store commands before encoding them into the real MTLCommandEncoder
213class IntermediateCommandStream
214{
215 public:
216 template <typename T>
217 inline IntermediateCommandStream &push(const T &val)
218 {
219 auto ptr = reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t *>(&val);
220 mBuffer.insert(mBuffer.end(), ptr, ptr + sizeof(T));
221 return *this;
222 }
223
224 inline IntermediateCommandStream &push(const uint8_t *bytes, size_t len)
225 {
226 mBuffer.insert(mBuffer.end(), bytes, bytes + len);
227 return *this;
228 }
229
230 template <typename T>
231 inline T peek()
232 {
233 ASSERT(mReadPtr <= mBuffer.size() - sizeof(T));
234 T re;
235 auto ptr = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t *>(&re);
236 std::copy(mBuffer.data() + mReadPtr, mBuffer.data() + mReadPtr + sizeof(T), ptr);
237 return re;
238 }
239
240 template <typename T>
241 inline T fetch()
242 {
243 auto re = peek<T>();
244 mReadPtr += sizeof(T);
245 return re;
246 }
247
248 inline const uint8_t *fetch(size_t bytes)
249 {
250 ASSERT(mReadPtr <= mBuffer.size() - bytes);
251 auto cur = mReadPtr;
252 mReadPtr += bytes;
253 return mBuffer.data() + cur;
254 }
255
256 inline void clear()
257 {
258 mBuffer.clear();
259 mReadPtr = 0;
260 }
261
262 inline void resetReadPtr(size_t readPtr)
263 {
264 ASSERT(readPtr <= mBuffer.size());
265 mReadPtr = readPtr;
266 }
267
268 inline bool good() const { return mReadPtr < mBuffer.size(); }
269
270 private:
271 std::vector<uint8_t> mBuffer;
272 size_t mReadPtr = 0;
273};
274
275// Per shader stage's states
276struct RenderCommandEncoderShaderStates
277{
278 RenderCommandEncoderShaderStates();
279
280 void reset();
281
282 std::array<id<MTLBuffer>, kMaxShaderBuffers> buffers;
283 std::array<uint32_t, kMaxShaderBuffers> bufferOffsets;
284 std::array<id<MTLSamplerState>, kMaxShaderSamplers> samplers;
285 std::array<Optional<std::pair<float, float>>, kMaxShaderSamplers> samplerLodClamps;
286 std::array<id<MTLTexture>, kMaxShaderSamplers> textures;
287};
288
289// Per render pass's states
290struct RenderCommandEncoderStates
291{
292 RenderCommandEncoderStates();
293
294 void reset();
295
296 id<MTLRenderPipelineState> renderPipeline;
297
298 MTLTriangleFillMode triangleFillMode;
299 MTLWinding winding;
300 MTLCullMode cullMode;
301
302 id<MTLDepthStencilState> depthStencilState;
303 float depthBias, depthSlopeScale, depthClamp;
304
305 uint32_t stencilFrontRef, stencilBackRef;
306
307 Optional<MTLViewport> viewport;
308 Optional<MTLScissorRect> scissorRect;
309
310 std::array<float, 4> blendColor;
311
312 gl::ShaderMap<RenderCommandEncoderShaderStates> perShaderStates;
313
314 MTLVisibilityResultMode visibilityResultMode;
315 size_t visibilityResultBufferOffset;
316};
317
318// Encoder for encoding render commands
319class RenderCommandEncoder final : public CommandEncoder
320{
321 public:
322 RenderCommandEncoder(CommandBuffer *cmdBuffer, const OcclusionQueryPool &queryPool);
323 ~RenderCommandEncoder() override;
324
325 // override CommandEncoder
326 bool valid() const { return mRecording; }
327 void reset() override;
328 void endEncoding() override;
329
330 // Restart the encoder so that new commands can be encoded.
331 // NOTE: parent CommandBuffer's restart() must be called before this.
332 RenderCommandEncoder &restart(const RenderPassDesc &desc);
333
334 RenderCommandEncoder &setRenderPipelineState(id<MTLRenderPipelineState> state);
335 RenderCommandEncoder &setTriangleFillMode(MTLTriangleFillMode mode);
336 RenderCommandEncoder &setFrontFacingWinding(MTLWinding winding);
337 RenderCommandEncoder &setCullMode(MTLCullMode mode);
338
339 RenderCommandEncoder &setDepthStencilState(id<MTLDepthStencilState> state);
340 RenderCommandEncoder &setDepthBias(float depthBias, float slopeScale, float clamp);
341 RenderCommandEncoder &setStencilRefVals(uint32_t frontRef, uint32_t backRef);
342 RenderCommandEncoder &setStencilRefVal(uint32_t ref);
343
344 RenderCommandEncoder &setViewport(const MTLViewport &viewport);
345 RenderCommandEncoder &setScissorRect(const MTLScissorRect &rect);
346
347 RenderCommandEncoder &setBlendColor(float r, float g, float b, float a);
348
349 RenderCommandEncoder &setVertexBuffer(const BufferRef &buffer, uint32_t offset, uint32_t index)
350 {
351 return setBuffer(gl::ShaderType::Vertex, buffer, offset, index);
352 }
353 RenderCommandEncoder &setVertexBytes(const uint8_t *bytes, size_t size, uint32_t index)
354 {
355 return setBytes(gl::ShaderType::Vertex, bytes, size, index);
356 }
357 template <typename T>
358 RenderCommandEncoder &setVertexData(const T &data, uint32_t index)
359 {
360 return setVertexBytes(reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t *>(&data), sizeof(T), index);
361 }
362 RenderCommandEncoder &setVertexSamplerState(id<MTLSamplerState> state,
363 float lodMinClamp,
364 float lodMaxClamp,
365 uint32_t index)
366 {
367 return setSamplerState(gl::ShaderType::Vertex, state, lodMinClamp, lodMaxClamp, index);
368 }
369 RenderCommandEncoder &setVertexTexture(const TextureRef &texture, uint32_t index)
370 {
371 return setTexture(gl::ShaderType::Vertex, texture, index);
372 }
373
374 RenderCommandEncoder &setFragmentBuffer(const BufferRef &buffer,
375 uint32_t offset,
376 uint32_t index)
377 {
378 return setBuffer(gl::ShaderType::Fragment, buffer, offset, index);
379 }
380 RenderCommandEncoder &setFragmentBytes(const uint8_t *bytes, size_t size, uint32_t index)
381 {
382 return setBytes(gl::ShaderType::Fragment, bytes, size, index);
383 }
384 template <typename T>
385 RenderCommandEncoder &setFragmentData(const T &data, uint32_t index)
386 {
387 return setFragmentBytes(reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t *>(&data), sizeof(T), index);
388 }
389 RenderCommandEncoder &setFragmentSamplerState(id<MTLSamplerState> state,
390 float lodMinClamp,
391 float lodMaxClamp,
392 uint32_t index)
393 {
394 return setSamplerState(gl::ShaderType::Fragment, state, lodMinClamp, lodMaxClamp, index);
395 }
396 RenderCommandEncoder &setFragmentTexture(const TextureRef &texture, uint32_t index)
397 {
398 return setTexture(gl::ShaderType::Fragment, texture, index);
399 }
400
401 RenderCommandEncoder &setBuffer(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
402 const BufferRef &buffer,
403 uint32_t offset,
404 uint32_t index);
405 RenderCommandEncoder &setBufferForWrite(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
406 const BufferRef &buffer,
407 uint32_t offset,
408 uint32_t index);
409 RenderCommandEncoder &setBytes(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
410 const uint8_t *bytes,
411 size_t size,
412 uint32_t index);
413 template <typename T>
414 RenderCommandEncoder &setData(gl::ShaderType shaderType, const T &data, uint32_t index)
415 {
416 return setBytes(shaderType, reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t *>(&data), sizeof(T), index);
417 }
418 RenderCommandEncoder &setSamplerState(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
419 id<MTLSamplerState> state,
420 float lodMinClamp,
421 float lodMaxClamp,
422 uint32_t index);
423 RenderCommandEncoder &setTexture(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
424 const TextureRef &texture,
425 uint32_t index);
426
427 RenderCommandEncoder &draw(MTLPrimitiveType primitiveType,
428 uint32_t vertexStart,
429 uint32_t vertexCount);
430 RenderCommandEncoder &drawInstanced(MTLPrimitiveType primitiveType,
431 uint32_t vertexStart,
432 uint32_t vertexCount,
433 uint32_t instances);
434 RenderCommandEncoder &drawIndexed(MTLPrimitiveType primitiveType,
435 uint32_t indexCount,
436 MTLIndexType indexType,
437 const BufferRef &indexBuffer,
438 size_t bufferOffset);
439 RenderCommandEncoder &drawIndexedInstanced(MTLPrimitiveType primitiveType,
440 uint32_t indexCount,
441 MTLIndexType indexType,
442 const BufferRef &indexBuffer,
443 size_t bufferOffset,
444 uint32_t instances);
445 RenderCommandEncoder &drawIndexedInstancedBaseVertex(MTLPrimitiveType primitiveType,
446 uint32_t indexCount,
447 MTLIndexType indexType,
448 const BufferRef &indexBuffer,
449 size_t bufferOffset,
450 uint32_t instances,
451 uint32_t baseVertex);
452
453 RenderCommandEncoder &setVisibilityResultMode(MTLVisibilityResultMode mode, size_t offset);
454
455 RenderCommandEncoder &useResource(const BufferRef &resource,
456 MTLResourceUsage usage,
457 mtl::RenderStages states);
458
459 RenderCommandEncoder &memoryBarrierWithResource(const BufferRef &resource,
460 mtl::RenderStages after,
461 mtl::RenderStages before);
462
463 RenderCommandEncoder &setColorStoreAction(MTLStoreAction action, uint32_t colorAttachmentIndex);
464 // Set store action for every color attachment.
465 RenderCommandEncoder &setColorStoreAction(MTLStoreAction action);
466
467 RenderCommandEncoder &setDepthStencilStoreAction(MTLStoreAction depthStoreAction,
468 MTLStoreAction stencilStoreAction);
469 RenderCommandEncoder &setDepthStoreAction(MTLStoreAction action);
470 RenderCommandEncoder &setStencilStoreAction(MTLStoreAction action);
471
472 // Set storeaction for every color & depth & stencil attachment.
473 RenderCommandEncoder &setStoreAction(MTLStoreAction action);
474
475 // Change the render pass's loadAction. Note that this operation is only allowed when there
476 // is no draw call recorded yet.
477 RenderCommandEncoder &setColorLoadAction(MTLLoadAction action,
478 const MTLClearColor &clearValue,
479 uint32_t colorAttachmentIndex);
480 RenderCommandEncoder &setDepthLoadAction(MTLLoadAction action, double clearValue);
481 RenderCommandEncoder &setStencilLoadAction(MTLLoadAction action, uint32_t clearValue);
482
483 void setLabel(NSString *label);
484
485 void pushDebugGroup(NSString *label) override;
486 void popDebugGroup() override;
487
488 const RenderPassDesc &renderPassDesc() const { return mRenderPassDesc; }
489 bool hasDrawCalls() const { return mHasDrawCalls; }
490
491 private:
492 // Override CommandEncoder
493 id<MTLRenderCommandEncoder> get()
494 {
495 return static_cast<id<MTLRenderCommandEncoder>>(CommandEncoder::get());
496 }
497 void insertDebugSignImpl(NSString *label) override;
498
499 void initAttachmentWriteDependencyAndScissorRect(const RenderPassAttachmentDesc &attachment);
500 void initWriteDependency(const TextureRef &texture);
501
502 void finalizeLoadStoreAction(MTLRenderPassAttachmentDescriptor *objCRenderPassAttachment);
503
504 void encodeMetalEncoder();
505 void simulateDiscardFramebuffer();
506 void endEncodingImpl(bool considerDiscardSimulation);
507
508 RenderCommandEncoder &commonSetBuffer(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
509 id<MTLBuffer> mtlBuffer,
510 uint32_t offset,
511 uint32_t index);
512
513 RenderPassDesc mRenderPassDesc;
514 // Cached Objective-C render pass desc to avoid re-allocate every frame.
515 mtl::AutoObjCObj<MTLRenderPassDescriptor> mCachedRenderPassDescObjC;
516
517 mtl::AutoObjCObj<NSString> mLabel;
518
519 MTLScissorRect mRenderPassMaxScissorRect;
520
521 const OcclusionQueryPool &mOcclusionQueryPool;
522 bool mRecording = false;
523 bool mHasDrawCalls = false;
524 IntermediateCommandStream mCommands;
525
526 gl::ShaderMap<uint8_t> mSetBufferCmds;
527 gl::ShaderMap<uint8_t> mSetBufferOffsetCmds;
528 gl::ShaderMap<uint8_t> mSetBytesCmds;
529 gl::ShaderMap<uint8_t> mSetTextureCmds;
530 gl::ShaderMap<uint8_t> mSetSamplerCmds;
531
532 RenderCommandEncoderStates mStateCache = {};
533
534 bool mPipelineStateSet = false;
535};
536
537class BlitCommandEncoder final : public CommandEncoder
538{
539 public:
540 BlitCommandEncoder(CommandBuffer *cmdBuffer);
541 ~BlitCommandEncoder() override;
542
543 // Restart the encoder so that new commands can be encoded.
544 // NOTE: parent CommandBuffer's restart() must be called before this.
545 BlitCommandEncoder &restart();
546
547 BlitCommandEncoder &copyBuffer(const BufferRef &src,
548 size_t srcOffset,
549 const BufferRef &dst,
550 size_t dstOffset,
551 size_t size);
552
553 BlitCommandEncoder &copyBufferToTexture(const BufferRef &src,
554 size_t srcOffset,
555 size_t srcBytesPerRow,
556 size_t srcBytesPerImage,
557 MTLSize srcSize,
558 const TextureRef &dst,
559 uint32_t dstSlice,
560 MipmapNativeLevel dstLevel,
561 MTLOrigin dstOrigin,
562 MTLBlitOption blitOption);
563
564 BlitCommandEncoder &copyTextureToBuffer(const TextureRef &src,
565 uint32_t srcSlice,
566 MipmapNativeLevel srcLevel,
567 MTLOrigin srcOrigin,
568 MTLSize srcSize,
569 const BufferRef &dst,
570 size_t dstOffset,
571 size_t dstBytesPerRow,
572 size_t dstBytesPerImage,
573 MTLBlitOption blitOption);
574
575 BlitCommandEncoder &copyTexture(const TextureRef &src,
576 uint32_t srcSlice,
577 MipmapNativeLevel srcLevel,
578 const TextureRef &dst,
579 uint32_t dstSlice,
580 MipmapNativeLevel dstLevel,
581 uint32_t sliceCount,
582 uint32_t levelCount);
583
584 BlitCommandEncoder &copyTexture(const TextureRef &src,
585 uint32_t srcSlice,
586 uint32_t srcLevel,
587 const TextureRef &dst,
588 uint32_t dstSlice,
589 uint32_t dstLevel,
590 uint32_t sliceCount,
591 uint32_t levelCount);
592
593 BlitCommandEncoder &fillBuffer(const BufferRef &buffer, NSRange range, uint8_t value);
594
595 BlitCommandEncoder &generateMipmapsForTexture(const TextureRef &texture);
596 BlitCommandEncoder &synchronizeResource(const BufferRef &buffer);
597 BlitCommandEncoder &synchronizeResource(const TextureRef &texture);
598
599 private:
600 id<MTLBlitCommandEncoder> get()
601 {
602 return static_cast<id<MTLBlitCommandEncoder>>(CommandEncoder::get());
603 }
604};
605
606class ComputeCommandEncoder final : public CommandEncoder
607{
608 public:
609 ComputeCommandEncoder(CommandBuffer *cmdBuffer);
610 ~ComputeCommandEncoder() override;
611
612 // Restart the encoder so that new commands can be encoded.
613 // NOTE: parent CommandBuffer's restart() must be called before this.
614 ComputeCommandEncoder &restart();
615
616 ComputeCommandEncoder &setComputePipelineState(id<MTLComputePipelineState> state);
617
618 ComputeCommandEncoder &setBuffer(const BufferRef &buffer, uint32_t offset, uint32_t index);
619 ComputeCommandEncoder &setBufferForWrite(const BufferRef &buffer,
620 uint32_t offset,
621 uint32_t index);
622 ComputeCommandEncoder &setBytes(const uint8_t *bytes, size_t size, uint32_t index);
623 template <typename T>
624 ComputeCommandEncoder &setData(const T &data, uint32_t index)
625 {
626 return setBytes(reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t *>(&data), sizeof(T), index);
627 }
628 ComputeCommandEncoder &setSamplerState(id<MTLSamplerState> state,
629 float lodMinClamp,
630 float lodMaxClamp,
631 uint32_t index);
632 ComputeCommandEncoder &setTexture(const TextureRef &texture, uint32_t index);
633 ComputeCommandEncoder &setTextureForWrite(const TextureRef &texture, uint32_t index);
634
635 ComputeCommandEncoder &dispatch(const MTLSize &threadGroupsPerGrid,
636 const MTLSize &threadsPerGroup);
637
638 ComputeCommandEncoder &dispatchNonUniform(const MTLSize &threadsPerGrid,
639 const MTLSize &threadsPerGroup);
640
641 private:
642 id<MTLComputeCommandEncoder> get()
643 {
644 return static_cast<id<MTLComputeCommandEncoder>>(CommandEncoder::get());
645 }
646};
